data.text: @covid_teachers Entirely predictable, yet simple safety measures could have made such a difference.
@covid_teachers Long covid - a public catastrophe, not even mentioned by @UKHSA , whose role is to protect us, not the government propaganda!

@covid_teachers @WeePrefab Last year, #NicolaSturgeon blocked me for complaining that Scottish school staff & pupils were #SittingDucks. The latest attempt by @theSNP/@scottishgreens to solve problem of poor ventilation in our schools was to suggest that they cut off the bottom of classroom doors!
@truthshamesthe6 @covid_teachers @LeahBra_numbers So this! What do the teachers/unions think is happening!?!

@covid_teachers Masks, filters, testing and isolation for contacts. 23 months into career ending long Covid, and it is outrageous that colleagues are still being put at major risk. Schools have been allowed to become vectors of infection out into communities. #MakeSchoolsSafe
